title: FotMob Pro
summary: Over 10 million downloads for the #1 football app
description: The #1 football app offering real time scores, news and breaking news notifications from your favorite teams. FotMob covers World Cup 2018, Premier League, Championship, League 1&2, National North&South, La Liga, Bundesliga, Champions League and all the major leagues and tournaments in the world, over 200 leagues in total!Over 10,000,000 people already installed FotMob. Join them now and experience: ✔ Livescores with the fastest updates available✔ Match stats (lineup, stats, goals, cards, penalties, missed penalties, assists and substitutions) ✔ Tables✔ Fixtures✔ News and top news notifications from all the major clubs✔ Top scorers and top assists✔ And much more!If you want to check the latest updates or have feedback then check out:http://www.fotmob.com/http://www.facebook.com/fotmobhttp://twitter.com/fotmobSome leagues we cover:★ Premier League★ Championship★ League 1 & 2★ Conference★ Eredivisie★ Bundesliga★ 2. & 3. Bundesliga★ Serie A★ Serie B★ La Liga (Liga BBVA)★ MLS (Major League Soccer)★ Europa League★ Champions League★ World Cup 2018★ Ligue 1 & Ligue 2★ Mexican league★ Scottish Premier League ★ Allsvenskan★ Superettan★ Tippeligaen★ Adeccoligaen★ and most other football/soccer leagues. Missing one? Ask us!
descriptionHTML:
The #1 football app offering real time scores, news and breaking news notifications from your favorite teams.


FotMob covers World Cup 2018, Premier League, Championship, League 1&2, National North&South, La Liga, Bundesliga, Champions League and all the major leagues and tournaments in the world, over 200 leagues in total!

Over 10,000,000 people already installed FotMob. Join them now and experience:
✔ Livescores with the fastest updates available
✔ Match stats (lineup, stats, goals, cards, penalties, missed penalties, assists and substitutions)
✔ Tables
✔ Fixtures
✔ News and top news notifications from all the major clubs
✔ Top scorers and top assists
✔ And much more!

If you want to check the latest updates or have feedback then check out:
http://www.fotmob.com/
http://www.facebook.com/fotmob
http://twitter.com/fotmob

Some leagues we cover:
★ Premier League
★ Championship
★ League 1 & 2
★ Conference
★ Eredivisie
★ Bundesliga
★ 2. & 3. Bundesliga
★ Serie A
★ Serie B
★ La Liga (Liga BBVA)
★ MLS (Major League Soccer)
★ Europa League
★ Champions League
★ World Cup 2018
★ Ligue 1 & Ligue 2
★ Mexican league
★ Scottish Premier League
★ Allsvenskan
★ Superettan
★ Tippeligaen
★ Adeccoligaen
★ and most other football/soccer leagues. Missing one? Ask us!
comments: Great idea - bad implementation. I did informed app developers about some issues with their scripts but they doesn't want to acknowledge it. They instead try to convince me that the information will show up some time... this week or next or next year. Other than that is great app. Unfortunately they do NOT listen. 2 stars for this.

EDIT: New update with fhe same old news: no "Brazil Cup" tables avaliable!  ORIGINAL REVIEW: Regarding "Brazil Cup", it started yesterday (Jan-31) but app only tells "No Tables Available" ... ah, come on !?!?
Just before the real and only World Cup start, the app crashes on start :-) ah well, poop happens :-)
Definitely my number one source to keep myself updated with whatever that has to do with football! Easy 5 stars
Please Add Tanzania #Vodacom premium league . I purchase this app
All the info i need :-D cheers
recentChanges: Offline mode is now enabled by default to enable a smoother experience in bad network conditions.
